Text.val: Author: Stephan Huppertz
24.09.2014 SH SCR19014 Fixed problem within INVS selection (added G.P. on INVS_ADMNO , INVS_CLNTNO)
14.07.2014 SH SCR19014 Extended INVS selection with INVS_THEORETICALCOMMISSION > 0; Added update INVS_BUYERSHARE_CLNA_ID
on curency group level; Added call of BSF117 for Carrefour Spain
02.10.2013 JH SCR18445 Chnaged update of CLNA_HGRP_CODE and CLNA_RUNNUMBER
26.08.2013 SH SCR18368 Changed update CLNA_URGENT = Y to N
10.06.2013 GB SCR18197 Changed update the CLNA_EXECUTIONDATE
06.12.2012 GB SCR17782 Changed value of update the CLNA_COSTSCHARGED from Y to N
10.10.2012 GB SCR17607 Changed value of update the CLNA_DESCRIPTION
05.10.2012 GB SCR17590 Changes name of this program from BSF100-15 - Prepare monthly Carrefour payment to
BSF100 - Prepare monthly Carrefour payment
10.09.2012 GB SCR17560 Changed calculation V.CALCULATEDCF

SQL_STMT_U.val: select INVS_ADMNO, INVS_CLNTNO, INVS_CURRENCY, min(INVS_SCSP_NO) as SCSP_NO, cast(sum(INVS_THEORETICALCOMMISSION) as decimal (13,2)) as SUM, cast(sum(INVS_CALCULATEDINTEREST) as decimal (13,2)) as CALCULATEDFL, cast(sum(INVS_DISCOUNTAMOUNT - INVS_THEORETICALCOMMISSION) as decimal (13,2)) as CALCULATEDCF, cast(sum(INVS_DISCOUNTAMOUNT) as decimal (13,2)) as SUPPLIERDISC from :1/INVS where INVS_SCSP_NO in (2, 4) and INVS_FINANCEDATE between ':2' and ':3' and INVS_CLNA_ID > 0 and INVS_THEORETICALCOMMISSION > 0 group by INVS_ADMNO, INVS_CLNTNO, INVS_CURRENCY order by INVS_ADMNO, INVS_CLNTNO, INVS_CURRENCY for fetch only

Text.val: @Note, if SQL selection is changed, also INVS selection in task "UpdateGroupedRowsINVS" has to be adjusted
... book the Carrefour share
... book the advance
... report difference to the users
... create payment specification (for Carrefour Spain)
-- Calc CLNA_ID
-- Update CLNA_AADVANCEH
-- Calc CLNA_RUNNUMBER only if V.OK = True
-- Set INVS_BUYERSHARE_CLNA_ID for all INVS in current selected group, see parent task
-- Set variables in parent task to call BAD013/BCM001/BSF117
